ygData.subject: Re: Down aboout yer sk? Read On.
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem with casting in melee is that you dont swing while casting. Besides that often the spells will get interupted, and siphon strength is redundant
ygData.messageBody:
The problem with casting in melee is that you dont swing while casting.
Besides that often the spells will get interupted, and siphon strength is
redundant after being cast once. At level 12 I feel that sk spellcasting is
almost useless. I will use siphon to lure and disease cloud so I can tank,
but that's about it.

----- Original Message -----
From: Adam Hill <adamthehill@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 6:36 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Down aboout yer sk? Read On.


> From: "Adam Hill" <adamthehill@...>
>
> Listen here,
> I quit my sk about 8 times.. keep comin back.. I'mm now level 17. Why ppl
> suck with their sk is because they misuyse him.. He is not a spellcaster..
> he is not a tank. Tank.. Use yer pet fer extra damage(not to aabsorb)
Blast
> all yer mana with what spells you have. Combined.. you are a monster. So
you
> cant heal.. neither can mages or straight warriors, rogues, monks. were
not
> alone. If you want to heeal.. be a cleric, see how fun that is. the SK can
> do more than most any other class save ranger and paladin. Use all your
> facets to their full extent. Currently, I am in unrest at level 17 tanking
> for higher level players. Al lthey need is my ac and decent hp's to heep
teh
> beasties busy.. All these beasties are red to me but with a solid group, i
> never get below 3 bubbles and, i have made 7- plat and 5 bubbles of exp
ind
> one night. Shadowknights arent easy. It says in the creation and everey
> website thay are. While i do agree we are underpowered comparatively, we
are
> not useless.
>
> I have been a welcome addition to many parties and continue to gain
riches,
> fame and levels.
>
> Krimzin
> Tarew Maar
> 17th level Dark Elf Sk
>
